Class OrdersDAO

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.operations.AbstractDAO<Orders>
dataAccess.operations.OrdersDAO
public class OrdersDAO
extends AbstractDAO<Orders>
OrdersDAO Class Provides specific queries for the Orders table.

  • Method Details

    • hasOrder

      public boolean hasOrder​(Clients client)
      Checks if given client has at least one order.
      Parameters:
      client - Client class object.
      Returns:
      True if the client has at least one order.

    • report

      public java.util.List<OrderReport> report()
      Executes a query for retrieving all the data regarding the orders in the OrderReport format.
      Returns:
      A list with all the orders in the database.

    • bill

      public java.util.List<OrderReport> bill​(int orderId)
      Executes a query for retrieving the data for a specific order. The result is interpreted as the bill for the client which owns the order.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The order id.
      Returns:
      The report for that order.
